archimate:Requirement.name: SY.1.1.8: A zero trust network architecture should protect critical resources by micro-segmenting critical data; applications, systems or software; assets/devices; or services (sometimes called the protect surface).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
